title: FPS heavily reducing troughout the game, goes from 50-14fps when normally at 85-90fps
body:
Hey,

So I've been trying to play a few games, but wanted to start off with Legend of the Poro King. When the game started I wondered why my fps were as low as 50, but didn't worry about. Then as soon as we meet in the middle they go down to 25 and then jump around drop lower to like 14 fps after a few minutes. It makes the game literally unplayable. Changing the settings to the lowest level makes no difference, pc is running smooth besides that and even restarting didn't change a thing.

Any idea what could be happening here?

replies.body:
There could be a couple different reasons for this happening, though, without your system logs, I'm taking a best guess based off of what has historically caused these issues. I'd like you to work through our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to address the most common causes of FPS issues before we investigate further.

Let me know if those steps resolve this issue.

I've tried everything I could. No idea what this is. The problem is related to League only, other games work just fine.
What else could I do?

In order to troubleshoot this further, we'll have to look at your system logs to see what's changed and what else could be wrong. I recommend running some of those logs using our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can assist from here.

Hit me up if you have any issues with those steps.
